data.name: Hell Ring
data.description: A band of metal that burns the finger it adorns. Grants tremendous power but leaves the wearer vulnerable to elemental attacks.

effects.description: Adds 80 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.description: A stylish headwrap crafted from the iridescent scales of desert serpents. The enchanted scales shift color to match the surrounding sands, granting the wearer enhanced perception.

data.description: Sleek footwear crafted from the finest sand serpent hide. The enchanted scales improve traction on loose sand and help the wearer sense valuable treasures underfoot.

data.name: Sandwhisper Coin
data.description: An ancient coin that seems to whisper secrets of the desert when held to the ear. Used as currency among the mysterious Sandwhisper tribe and their traders.

data.name: Maurander Hand
data.description: The severed hand of a desert marauder, preserved by the dry heat. Dark magic lingers in the mummified flesh, making it useful for crafting intimidating equipment.

data.name: Darkforged Plate
data.description: Midnight-black armor forged in shadow fires. Etched with crimson runes that channel both water and fire magic, it seems to absorb light rather than reflect it.

data.name: Darkforged Shield
data.description: A shield of pure darkness that seems to bend shadows around it. Ancient protective sigils grant universal elemental resistance while making the bearer a priority target.

data.name: Darkforged Boots

data.name: Mesh Legs Armor
data.description: Flexible leg protection crafted from enchanted chainmail. Though it restricts carrying capacity, it grants exceptional wisdom and combat prowess through its mystical links.

data.name: Enchanted Antidote
data.description: A shimmering blue liquid that neutralizes even the deadliest poisons. Distilled from rare desert plants and infused with magical properties to purify the bloodstream.

effects.description: At the beginning of the turn, if the character has at least one poison on him, removes 200 poison damage.

data.name: Dusk Bettle Shell
data.description: A glossy black shell fragment from nocturnal desert beetles. When moonlight strikes it, mysterious patterns emerge, revealing its magical properties.

data.name: Duskworm Skin
data.description: Iridescent hide from the elusive duskworm that only surfaces at twilight. The skin changes color with the angle of light, useful for crafting magical equipment.

data.name: Torch Cactus Flower
data.description: A vibrant orange flower that glows faintly in darkness. Its petals contain potent essence used in advanced desert alchemy.

data.name: Palm Wood
data.description: Lightweight yet sturdy wood from desert palm trees. Its unique grain pattern makes it highly sought after by master craftsmen.

data.name: Adamantite Ore
data.description: A deep green ore with red flecks that pulses with ancient power. Only the most skilled miners can extract it from the deepest desert caves.

data.name: Swordfish
data.description: A massive fish with a distinctive bill resembling a sword. Prized by fishermen for its challenging catch and exceptional taste.

data.name: Adamantite Bar
data.description: A gleaming metallic bar with a greenish hue. The metal seems to have a life of its own, humming with power when touched by skilled smiths.

data.name: Palm Plank
data.description: A finely cut plank of palm wood, treated to enhance its natural durability. Perfect for crafting desert-themed furniture and equipment.

data.name: Cooked Swordfish
data.description: Perfectly grilled swordfish steak with a golden crust. The succulent meat provides exceptional sustenance for any adventurer facing the harsh desert.

effects.description: Heal 500 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Holey Boot
data.description: A waterlogged boot riddled with holes and filled with sand. Despite its worthless appearance, collectors pay handsomely for these rare fishing curiosities.

data.name: Coconut
data.description: A large brown nut with sweet, refreshing water and nutritious white flesh inside. Provides immediate hydration and energy in the scorching desert.

effects.description: Heal 250 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Desert Wrap
data.description: An elaborate headdress worn by desert nomads to protect against sandstorms. Ancient runes woven into the fabric enhance the wearer's connection to earth energies.

data.name: Alexandrite
data.description: A rare gemstone that changes color depending on the light source. Imbued with powerful earth magic, it resonates deeply with the desert's hidden energies.

data.name: Alexandrite Stone
data.description: A raw, uncut alexandrite crystal with mesmerizing color-shifting properties. These rare stones are found deep within ancient desert volcanic tubes.

data.name: Desert Whip
data.description: A fearsome weapon crafted from the spine of a massive desert serpent. Its barbed tip is coated with crystallized earth magic that tears through flesh and armor alike.

effects.description: Adds 125 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Sandwhisper Key
data.description: An ornate golden key etched with ancient desert glyphs. It hums softly when near hidden chambers of the Sandwhisper tribe's ancestral tombs.

data.name: Sandwhisper Bag
data.description: A spacious bag woven from enchanted desert fibers. Despite its seemingly modest size, the interior space bends reality, holding far more than should be possible.

effects.description: Adds 50 to the maximum number of items in the inventory when equipped.

data.name: Enchanted Health Splash Potion
data.description: An intensely glowing crimson potion with swirling golden particles. When shattered, it releases powerful healing energy that can save even the most gravely wounded.

effects.description: Restores 400 HP at the start of the turn to another character who has lost the most health if that character has less than 50% of their health points remaining.

data.name: Golden Dust
data.description: Shimmering magical particles that float and dance in their container. This precious substance, harvested from ancient desert guardians, enhances the magical properties of equipment.

data.name: Adamantite Ring
data.description: A heavy ring of dark green adamantite that crackles with air energy. It channels the power of storms into devastating critical strikes while marking the wearer as a threat.
